name: Monster Domination
description:
Monster Domination is inspired by the classic Godzilla Domination for the Game Boy Advance.
Due to some "artistic inconsistencies" and our combined incompetence with Pixelart, the Kajius were quickly replaced by fighter jets and tanks. (Also there is a surprise visit later in the game.)

The Controls:
Arrow Keys = Movement
C = Ranged Attack
V = Shield that blocks attacks

Top Secret Tip:
Use arrows left and right for direction of the Shield.

Thank you very much for playing
This has been the first Game Jam we did as a Team and even the very first Game Jam for some of our teammates, in an engine we were completly unfamiliar with, so it should be obvious that it was an interesting and fun time.

Members of the "Horrible Life Decisions Team":
Chasethechicken
Hoertech17
Voltolab
YpkTheOne

Programs used:
Godot Engine
